org.gradle.plugins.binaries.model

Interface CompileSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LibraryCompileSpec

    public interface CompileSpec
extends Named
    A high level interface to the compiler, specifying what is to be compiled and how.
